profile.cv: Minami Tanaka & Mikako Komatsu & Sora Amamiya

comments.comment:
Warrior maidens clad in armor.
The daughters of the Allfather.
These warriors were manufactured en masse by the god Odin, the highest being in Norse mythology.

They fly over innumerable battlefields, selecting the worthiest souls from among those who had fallen in battle and guiding them to the Allfather's shining gold palace, Valhalla.
These souls were all gathered to be a part of the Allfather's army to slaughter the giants, in preparation for the Twilight of the Gods, known as Ragnarök.

Height/Weight: 159cm, 46kg
Origin: Norse Mythology
Region: Europe
Alignment: Lawful-Good
Gender: Female
Their shields are made from divine iron, granted to them by Odin.

Daughters of the Allfather Odin, they are at once individuals and a singular collective that makes up the entity called Valkyrie. A being very close to a Divine Spirit demigod, which enables them to possess high ranked Divinity.

Valkyrie is made up of multiple beings created en masse by Odin the Allfather in preparation for the Twilight of the Gods, or Ragnarök, and they operate and function almost like an automated machine.

They mounted celestial horses and flew through the skies over battlefields, selecting fallen souls to take to Valhalla. However, when the eldest daughter, Brynhild, met the hero Sigurd and gained intense emotion and individuality, this became the turning point that led to the fall in their numbers.

Around the mid-1980s, a report was turned in to the Lord of the Curses Department at the Clock Tower which hypothesized that the number of Valkyrie had dwindled down by half by the time the final war between gods and giants, Ragnarök, began. The claim was temporarily a hot topic within the magecraft world.

This Servant Valkyrie has manifested under special circumstances. Namely, she possesses an atypical Spirit Origin.

While her magical energy may increase as her chemistry with her Master improves, unlike other Servants, her Spirit Origin does not transform into a more powerful state, since each Valkyrie has a limit to her power.

For Chaldea's summoning system, whenever a Valkyrie undergoes Ascension, there is a high probability that the current individual Valkyrie will disappear and a different Valkyrie who is better able to withstand the redefined magical energy capacity is summoned to replace the former.

Thrúd
Hildr
Ortlinde

These three sisters have been verified and found to rotate, based on Chaldea's summoning and Ascension system. They are likely individuals that have bonded with a Master or will bond with one in the future.
While there may only be minute differences in how much magical energy each possesses, they are essentially the same in nature and they all manifest under the same True Name of Valkyrie. Although they actually have their own individual names of Thrúd, Hildr, and Ortlinde, the girls reject the idea of being treated as separate entities.

"There is no innate difference between the Valkyries."
"That's right. We are all connected, sharing the same roots."
"Yes. Sister Brynhild is the strange one..."
So she...they...say.

『Gungnir』
Rank: B
NP Type: Anti-Army
Range: 5 - 40
Maximum Targets: 20

Allfather's Declaration, False.
A weapon that was granted by the Allfather, Odin. It is a crude replica of the Allfather's Declaration (Gungnir). If thrown afterits True Name is revealed, its Sure Hit function can be activated. In FGO, its True Name form is not utilized. It is instead wielded as an ordinary weapon.

『Ragnarök Lífþrasir』
Rank: B
NP Type: Anti-Army
Range: 0 - 40
Maximum Targets: 100

Final Illusion, Girls Advent.
The sisters have completely synchronized...
Multiple Valkyries assemble, and they fulfill their purpose of taking the souls of the fallen brave to Valhalla by raising their Noble Phantasm, Gungnir, and hurling it down upon their targets together.
While their spears inflict damage to their targets, a Bounded Field is formed within the effective area. Within this boundary, pure souls are granted mercy, while the lives of the wicked are cast aside. It is a realm that expels Servants, familiars, spells, phantasmals, bloodsucking species, and any other beings that fall under a magecraft and magical energy category. Entities that fail to resist are expelled.

comments.condMessage: Unlock after clearing Lostbelt No.2 and reach Bond Level 5
comments.comment:
Why was Valkyrie summoned with a unique Spirit Origin? Could it be the result of all the meetings and partings that happened in the Scandinavian Lostbelt that eventually led her to bond with her Master?

It should be noted that the summoned sisters are the Heroic Spirit Servants from Proper Human History and are different from the sisters Chaldea met during the Scandinavian Lostbelt. They are completely different beings.

Only those within the Shadow Border remember the maiden warriors of the Scandinavian Lostbelt.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
Yes. We are all essentially the same.
That is what it means to be a Valkyrie.
Odin, the Allfather, designed us that way.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
Our appearance, way of speaking, and personalities all differ, you say?
Well, yes...
But know that all Valkyrie share the same foundation and fundamental principles.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
Humans sometimes share their differing opinions with each other, correct?
However, that is not the case for us.
Valkyrie never have differing opinions.
We are like different textures applied to the same model.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
You humans create what you call machines, correct?
We are similar to that. We think like humans and may show emotion, but we do not possess true diversity like humans.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 5
voiceLines.subtitle:
Do we want to be more human, you ask?
No, we do not think that way.
But older sister Brynhild and others...have fallen...and they really have turned more human...

voiceLines.name: Conversation 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
Let us head out to the battlefield.
Gaining experience is most important.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
Master.
It's a very strange feeling... Serving a human is different than working with my sisters.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
We serve you, Master.
But we instinctively seek out warriors... I'm sorry about that, since that's not part of our duties of a Servant.

voiceLines.name: Likes
voiceLines.subtitle: Of highest importance to us are the souls of fallen heroes. Next comes our sisters, the Valkyries who were created before us.

voiceLines.name: Dislikes
voiceLines.subtitle:
What I dislike...
No, there is nothing.
That is the truth.

voiceLines.name: About the Holy Grail
voiceLines.subtitle:
An omnipotent wish-granting device, the Holy Grail.
I am aware of it. I have great interest in it.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 7
voiceLines.subtitle:
Older sister...?
It really is Brynhild!
I...I...!
I've always wanted to meet you...!

voiceLines.name: Conversation 8
voiceLines.subtitle:
I sense a fallen warrior!
I'm sorry, please give me some time, Master. I must lead them to Valhalla...
Oh, but they're a Servant, so I cannot lead them like I normally do with humans...if that's the case, I must recruit them personally...

voiceLines.name: Conversation 10
voiceLines.subtitle:
The hero of Barnstokk...the son of Sigmund, Sigurd!
You...it's your fault that my older sister...!

voiceLines.name: Conversation 11
voiceLines.subtitle:
This sensation...it seems to bring back memories...but it's a different feeling than what I have with my sisters...
Could it be a trick of the senses?

voiceLines.name: Conversation 12
voiceLines.subtitle:
The snow goddess, Skadi.
I never thought I would be able to meet her.
But she seems somewhat different...is she really the great Skadi!?

voiceLines.name: During an Event
voiceLines.subtitle:
There is a festival going on. Oh, I have detected that a battle may occur during this festival.
Let's participate. This will be invaluable experience for battle.

voiceLines.name: Birthday
voiceLines.subtitle:
Happy birthday, Master.
I hear that humans offer gifts on such occasions.
Then from me...
I can at least use my runes to give you a blessing...

voiceLines.name: Level up
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 303300_0_G010]My magical energy has increased.
[id 303300_0_G011]My combat performance also appears to have improved.
[id 303300_0_G012]That's a relief.

voiceLines.name: Summon
text:
[r]
I never imagined I would be summoned by a human.

[r]
Please rest assured. Our contract is officially complete.

[r]
I acknowledge you as my Master.

[r]
From here on, please use us to protect humanity.
voiceLines.subtitle:
Valkyrie. Individual designation, Ortlinde.
Eh? You're a...human? It's just a bit surprising. I never imagined I would be summoned by a human.
Please rest assured. Our contract is officially complete. I acknowledge you as my Master. From here on, please use us to protect humanity.

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Starting combat operations.

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 2
voiceLines.subtitle: I will give it my all.

voiceLines.name: Skill 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Battle assistance. Activating rune.

voiceLines.name: Skill 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Adjusting for the situation...

voiceLines.name: Command Card 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Roger...

voiceLines.name: Command Card 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Yes.

voiceLines.name: Command Card 3
voiceLines.subtitle: U-understood.

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm Card
voiceLines.subtitle: Input confirmed. Releasing Noble Phantasm.

voiceLines.name: Attack 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Ha!

voiceLines.name: Attack 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Ya!

voiceLines.name: Attack 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Heh...

voiceLines.name: Extra Attack
voiceLines.subtitle: Special exception: using an attack-type rune!

voiceLines.name: Damage 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Kyaaah!

voiceLines.name: Damage 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Owww!

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 1
voiceLines.subtitle: My Spirit Origin can't handle it... I'm sorry...

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Everyone...I'm sorry...

voiceLines.name: Victory 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Battle complete. So I survived...

voiceLines.name: Victory 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Please give me your next orders, Master.

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 303300_0_B050]Manifesting corresponding bodies.
[id 303300_0_B051]Synchronizing.
[id 303300_0_B052]Target set.
[id 303300_0_B053]Ragnarök Lífþrasir!

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
We are the Valkyrie. We are Scandinavian warrior maidens.
Yep, we're different from humans.
We are one of many, created by our father...the Norse Allfather, Odin. Even now, our father's orders guide us.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
A long time ago, we used to mount celestial horses and ride through the sky.
But now that we're in the form of a Servant, it looks like we can't do that.
That's a little disappointing.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
Our original purpose was to carry the souls of the fallen to Valhalla.
But that's not the case anymore.
And because it's not the case anymore, I'm able to be by your side.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
Our purpose now is to fight alongside you.
That's the command input into us.
Whether our father gave us that command or not... No, I don't know.
And the reason why we've been registered as Heroic Spirits on the Throne is also something I don't know.
But maybe Thrúd knows...

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 5
voiceLines.subtitle:
Um, so...
I'm sure it must bother you that our baseline imperatives come from a source other than you, Master.
It doesn't? Really?
Oh...so you're saying that you're satisfied as long as we fight with you?
Huh. So that's the kind of person you are. Are all humans like you?
Ahaha! That's so interesting!

voiceLines.name: Conversation 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
Let's head out to the battlefield.
Everything's all about gaining experience!

voiceLines.name: Conversation 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
A Master, huh?
Serving a human does feel strange.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
It's funny...it doesn't feel like you're ordering us around.
Is it because you're fighting along with us?

voiceLines.name: Likes
voiceLines.subtitle:
What I like? I don't know... What I consider to be important are the souls of warriors. And also my sisters...
Hmmm, but I guess it's not like that. I don't actually understand this concept of liking something.

voiceLines.name: Dislikes
voiceLines.subtitle:
What I dislike?
We don't have anything like that.
There may be things that are considered highly important, but there is nothing that is especially set as low, either.

voiceLines.name: About the Holy Grail
voiceLines.subtitle:
The Holy Grail...
An omnipotent wish-granting device, huh? If such a thing existed, I feel like war would break out over it.
But then that might mean more fallen warriors!

voiceLines.name: Conversation 7
voiceLines.subtitle:
No...it can't be...!
I can't believe our sister Brynhild is here!
What's going on!?

voiceLines.name: Conversation 8
voiceLines.subtitle:
Hey, there's a warrior here!
Oh, there's a lot of them here...
Hmmm, I wish they would all come to Valhalla!

voiceLines.name: Conversation 10
voiceLines.subtitle:
Sigurd...
N-no, nothing. Never mind...

voiceLines.name: Conversation 11
voiceLines.subtitle:
Wave-form detected.
Synchronization...not possible.
Cannot scan corresponding body.
That's weird. I thought there was a comrade around, but I guess they're completely different.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 12
voiceLines.subtitle:
Isn't that the great Skadi? The goddess?
She's not? Hm?
She's Scáthach from the Land of Shadows? Does that mean she's the Celtic Scáthach? They're different people?

voiceLines.name: During an Event
voiceLines.subtitle:
Fighting a lot means getting stronger.
I'm not talking about myself... I'm talking about you!
Now come on, let's go!

voiceLines.name: Birthday
voiceLines.subtitle:
Birthday?
Oh I see. Teehee. Happy birthday, Master!
I can give you a blessing using my runes... Want me to do that?

voiceLines.name: Level up
voiceLines.subtitle: [id 303300_1_G010,303300_1_G011]Magical energy increased. Feels good!

voiceLines.name: Ascension 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 303300_1_G030]Ah, there we go!
[id 303300_1_G031]Teehee. Surprised?
[id 303300_1_G032]We don't Ascend like normal Heroic Spirits. [id 303300_1_G033]It's more like our Spirit Origin gets redefined through Ascension. [id 303300_1_G034]I guess it's called substitution summoning, or something like that.
[id 303300_1_G035]Anyway, let me formally introduce myself:
[id 303300_1_G036]I'm Valkyrie, Hildr.
[id 303300_1_G037]Master, take good care of me like you did with Ortlinde.

voiceLines.name: Ascension 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 303300_1_G020]Oh, so a redefinition doesn't happen just from something like this...
[id 303300_1_G021]Please continue to take care of me, Master!

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 1
voiceLines.subtitle: We're going to start battle, Master.

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Let's go!

voiceLines.name: Skill 1
voiceLines.subtitle: O spear, O runes, give me your power!

voiceLines.name: Skill 2
voiceLines.subtitle: I'm going to get all fired up!

voiceLines.name: Command Card 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Got it!

voiceLines.name: Command Card 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Yep!

voiceLines.name: Command Card 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Okay!

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm Card
voiceLines.subtitle: Input confirmed. I hope it works out!

voiceLines.name: Attack 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Hah!

voiceLines.name: Attack 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Toh!

voiceLines.name: Attack 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Yaaah!

voiceLines.name: Extra Attack
voiceLines.subtitle: Father! Please aid me!

voiceLines.name: Damage 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Knnngh!

voiceLines.name: Damage 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Wah!

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 1
voiceLines.subtitle: I'm sorry...I can't...win...

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Sister Brynhild...

voiceLines.name: Victory 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Whew. That felt good!

voiceLines.name: Victory 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Master, I think I can fight more!

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 303300_1_B050]Manifesting corresponding bodies.
[id 303300_1_B051]Synchronizing!
[id 303300_1_B052]Let's go, everyone!
[id 303300_1_B053]Ragnarök Lífþrasir!

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
We are the Valkyrie. We are many in number, created by the Allfather, Odin.
The Allfather's commands have been input into our Spirit Origin.
No changes can be made. Absolutely none.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Originally, we flew above battlefields on celestial horses, selecting souls to take to Valhalla in preparation for the inevitable end.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
The end that I speak of... Is it Ragnarök, you ask?
I cannot divulge that information.
I'm sorry, Master.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
Should the end really come, we will likely not treat you as our Master, but as a warrior for Valhalla.
But I...
No, never mind.
A momentary burst of static interrupted my thought process. Please do not worry about it.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 5
voiceLines.subtitle:
There are some records that say some Valkyrie were still active even after the Age of Gods.
But during the transition to human history, most of them vanished, and by the twenty-first century...
Well, whether that is accurate or not is unknown. Are there no more? Or are there still some who are wandering, continuing their search for the fallen?
Either way, it seems like the three of us are truly the final Valkyrie.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
You require experience.
Come, let's head to the battlefield.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
Master.
Show me your valor.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
Past or present, we Valkyrie will always be drawn to brave warriors.
Well, it's not clear whether you are a warrior or not, but...

voiceLines.name: Likes
voiceLines.subtitle:
What I like?
We Valkyrie hold the souls of the brave to be tremendously important.
And we also regard the great predecessors of the Valkyrie to be important as well.

voiceLines.name: Dislikes
voiceLines.subtitle:
What I dislike?
Valkyrie obey orders. There is nothing in particular to dislike.
Oh, you mean the things that I personally like and dislike?
There is no need for each individual unit to set such priorities.

voiceLines.name: About the Holy Grail
voiceLines.subtitle: Battles over the Holy Grail will at times create fallen heroes.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 7
voiceLines.subtitle:
Sister Brynhild...
I never imagined I would see you again.
Oh?
I feel warmth in my chest... What does this mean?

voiceLines.name: Conversation 8
voiceLines.subtitle: I have detected a fallen hero. I ask that you permit me to invite them to Valhalla, Master.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 10
voiceLines.subtitle:
Sigurd.
You are the hero who seduced our older sister!
I...we...will never forgive...!

voiceLines.name: Conversation 11
voiceLines.subtitle:
This wavelength... No, I was wrong.
You're not a Valkyrie, but how could we be so...similar?

voiceLines.name: Conversation 12
voiceLines.subtitle:
The great Skadi.
Oh, you're Scáthach of the Celts?
How could that be?

voiceLines.name: During an Event
voiceLines.subtitle:
A warrior grows by gaining many experiences.
If that is true, then let us head out.

voiceLines.name: Birthday
voiceLines.subtitle:
So it's your birthday?
If you desire it, I can offer you a blessing via runes...

voiceLines.name: Level up
voiceLines.subtitle: [id 303300_2_G010]Magical energy increased. Performance has been expanded, Master.

voiceLines.name: Ascension 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 303300_2_G040]Redefinition of the Spirit Origin due to Ascension [delay 3.0]and substitution summoning has been confirmed.
[id 303300_2_G041]I am Valkyrie, Thrúd.
[id 303300_2_G042]Master, we will continue to serve you.

voiceLines.name: Ascension 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 303300_2_G050]Ortlinde: What a surprise. [id 303300_2_G051]Master, you have elevated each of our magical energy to its limit.
[id 303300_2_G052]Hildr: Yeah, that's amazing. And you did it for all three of us.
[id 303300_2_G053]Thrúd: It appears you are a capable Master.
[id 303300_2_G054,303300_2_G055]We shall continue to serve you, at least until this Spirit Origin ceases to exist. [id 303300_2_G056]Please continue to take good care of us.

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Begin battle!

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Let's annihilate the target.

voiceLines.name: Skill 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Ability, activate.

voiceLines.name: Skill 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Allfather, give me your strength.

voiceLines.name: Command Card 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Understood.

voiceLines.name: Command Card 2
voiceLines.subtitle: I understand.

voiceLines.name: Command Card 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Yes.

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm Card
voiceLines.subtitle: Input confirmed.

voiceLines.name: Attack 1
voiceLines.subtitle: I will attack.

voiceLines.name: Attack 2
